alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 8:22PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAYETTE...TUCKER AND PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EST... At 821 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Friendsville to 8 miles south of Newburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Thomas, Rowlesburg, Newburg, Hendricks, Hambleton, Albright, Tunnelton, and Markleysburg. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 27 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
